data.actual_result: The ban message does not show when clicking on the ban
data.expected_result: A ban message should appear when you click on the banned user
data.short_description: Banning someone with a ban message doesn't show the ban message in the audit logs (however a ban message does show on desktop)
data.steps_to_repro: - Ban someone and make sure to include a ban message - Go to the Audit Logs and observe the ban
